title: Sunbeam King-Size Moist/Dry Heating Pad with UltraHeat Technology and 4 Heat Settings

description.detailed:
• King-size heating pad offers soothing heat therapy over a larger area
  • Ideal for soothing arthritic pains, muscle aches, and a variety of other ailments
  • Transfers heat to the targeted area to help increase blood flow, relax muscles, and accelerate healing
  • Compatible with moist heating for deeper, more penetrating pain relief
  • Adjustable heat pad features 4 heat settings and 2-hour auto-shutoff
  • Controller features a gliding button and LED indicators for easy operation
  • Soft machine-washable cover
description.short:

description.medium: Help arthritic pain and everyday muscle aches fade away with the Sunbeam King Size Heating Pad with UltraHeat. Help soothe and relieve discomfort with UltraHeat technology to maintain even, consistent heat to the areas that cause aches. Three heat settings provide the level of intensity you need to begin feeling better. It includes a convenient extra-long, nine-foot power cord.

description.detailed:
• ELECTRIC HEATING PAD RELIEVES PAIN simply by directing a stream of heat to the spot that hurts.
  • XXL HEATING PAD WITH AUTO SHUT OFF. Amazing XX-Large heat wrap for your shoulder / neck / back pain.
  • MADE FROM GENTLE MICROPLUSH. Enjoy your heat therapy with soft microplush electric heating pads.
  • 3 HEAT OPTIONS. With Geniani heat pad, you can enjoy either low, medium, or high heat level.
  • MOIST HEATING PAD OPTION. Take advantage of dry or moist heat therapy. This heating pad does it all!
description.short:

  • A fit for both moist and dry heating therapy;
  • Superfast heating with three heat modes;
  • Gentle microplush fibers for better relaxation;

description.medium: Help soothe muscle ache and arthritic pain with the Sunbeam Heating Pad with UltraHeat Technology. Designed with a sponge insert to deliver moist heat therapy to sore, aching muscles and help relieve arthritic pain. Soothe and relieve discomfort with UltraHeat technology to maintain even, consistent heat to the areas that cause aches. Delivers dry or moist heat therapy with 3 heat-settings to provide the level of intensity you need. Includes a convenient extra-long power cord.

title: Sunbeam Contoured Back Wrap Heating Pad with 4 Heat Settings

description.detailed:
• TARGETED HEAT THERAPY: Sunbeam Heated Back Wrap is uniquely designed to provide targeted back pain relief by contouring to the shape of the back 
  • STAYS IN PLACE: The electric heating pad wrap stays in place with a comfortable, adjustable waist strap that extends up to 85 inches around, so you can get relief hands-free
  • CLINICALLY PROVEN TREATMENT: Heat is clinically proven to relieve pain associated with muscle tension and stress; it increases blood flow to the source of the pain, which accelerates tissue healing
  • MOIST HEAT OPTION: Spray this Sunbeam heating pad with water to provide deep penetrating pain relief 
  • CONVENIENT DESIGN: Features 4 heat settings, 2-hour auto-off for peace of mind, and a long, convenient 9-foot cord
  • MACHINE WASHABLE PAD: Super-soft, micromink fabric is machine washable; simply disconnect the pad from the cord and place in the washing machine
description.short: Sunbeam Contoured Back Heating Pad

title: XL Electric Heating Pad with Auto Shut Off for Moist and Dry Heat Therapy - Fast Back Pain Relief, Brown Color, 12 x 24 inches

description.detailed:
• RELIEF FOR PAIN AND SORE MUSCLES. Geniani heating pads help you get rid of the pain by directing a stream of heat towards it. Heat helps muscles relax, and that?s how the pain goes away.
  • FAST HEATING KING SIZE PAD. Several minutes of heating therapy are enough to feel the relief and forget about aching muscles.
  • MICROPLUSH FIBERS. In order for our heating pads to be comfortable for daily use, we use soft and flexible microplush fibers.
  • ADJUSTABLE HEAT OPTIONS. You can choose either low, medium or high temperature for heating therapy depending on what you like better.
  • 5 YEARS WARRANTY. Our clients have always been the first priority to Geniani. That?s why we are happy to offer you a risk-free purchase and 5 years warranty!

title: Electric Neck/Shoulder Warmer-Heating Pad with 3 Settings, Auto Shut Off, Front Clasp and Long Detachable Cord-Soft Plush Heat Pack by Bluestone (Tan)

description.detailed:
• SOFT AND COZY- With a soft plush exterior this electric warmer will feel soothing and comfortable against your skin as you relax. With a front clasp to hold it in place, it’s perfect to snuggle up with in bed, on the couch, or on your favorite recliner!
  • 3 HEAT SETTINGS- Adjust the heat to your liking with the push of a button. This electric heating pad has an LED indicator for low, medium, and high settings so that you can always change the level of warmth to suit your needs and comfort level.
  • AUTO SHUT-OFF- The warming pad has an auto shut-off, so that it automatically turns off after 2 hours. This convenient feature allows you to relax with your heating pad without fear overheating.
  • MACHINE WASHABLE- Equipped with an extra-long cord that is detachable, you can easily wash your neck and shoulder warmer as needed. Remove the cord, machine wash in cold water with mild detergent, on the gentle cycle, then air dry completely before use.
  • PRODUCT DETAILS- Material: Polyester. Dimensions: Pad: (L)24.5” x (W)17.5”, Cord: 10’.  Voltage: 120VAC, Frequency:60hz, Watts: 50W, Amperage: .8A. High temperature: 176F. Overheating protection (PTC+NTC heating system) ETL/FDA approval. Color: Tan.
description.short: Merchandise

title: XL Heat Pad Blanket- Electric Moist/Dry Heating Mat with 9 foot AC Power Cable & 4 Remote Controlled Temperature Settings, Washable Cover by Bluestone

description.detailed:
?             TEMPERATURE SETTINGS- Heating mat comes with 4 different temperature settings: High, Medium, Low, and Warm. It also features an absorbent sponge to let you apply either dry or moist, deep heat to your preference.

?             MACHINE WASHABLE- 100% polyester cover is easily removed and is machine washable, letting you keep your heat pad clean and sanitary. After washing, simply place cover around mat again and snap it closed!

?             KING SIZED- This pad is 228 square inches of soothing moist or dry heat! AC power cord is 9 feet long allowing you to be in your most comfortable position while still being able to use the XL heating mat.

?             AUTOMATIC SHUT OFF- To keep you and your family safe, the king sized electric blanket automatically shuts off after 40 minutes of continuous use.

?             PRODUCT DETAILS- Dimensions- 24 inches (L) x 12 (W) x 1 inch (H). AC Power Cord length- 9 feet. Machine washable cover material- 100% polyester. Remote material- ABS. LED Remote.
description.short:
• LED lighted controller has four settings: high, medium, low and warm
  • Removable, machine washable cover

description.medium: The SoftHeat King Size Heating Pad features an extra-large pad, which provides comfort to multiple parts of the body at once. It uses a combination or moist and dry heat to increase blood flow to the injured area and provide relief to pain and discomfort. It features an extra long cord for an added convenience and a 1 hour automatic shut off timer.

title: Bluestone Electric Heating Pad with 9.5 Foot Cord and 8 Heat and 4 Timer Settings (Grey)

description.detailed:
• SOFT AND COZY- With a soft exterior this electric warmer will feel soothing and comfortable against your skin as you relax. It can be used anywhere on the body, and is perfect to snuggle up with in bed, on the couch, or on your favorite recliner!
  • 8 HEAT SETTINGS- Adjust the heat to your liking with the push of a button. This electric heating pad has an LED indicator for low, medium, and high settings so that you can always change the level of warmth to suit your needs and comfort level.
  • 4 TIMER SETTINGS- The warming pad has 30, 60, 90 and 120 minute timer settings on the attached LCD controller. This convenient feature allows you to relax with your heating pad without fear of overheating.
  • MACHINE WASHABLE- Equipped two snap closures, you can easily wash the cover of your electric heating pad as needed. Remove the cover, machine wash in cold water with mild detergent, on the gentle cycle, then air dry completely before use.
  • PRODUCT DETAILS- Material: Polyester. Dimensions: Pad: (L)12” x (W)15”, Cord: 9.5’.  Voltage: 120VAC, Watts: 40W. Color: Grey.
